title: Cebuano - New Testament (Book)
description: Cebuano translation of the New Testament. Cebuano, also referred to by most of its speakers simply and generically as Binisaya, is an Austronesian language, spoken in the southern Philippines.

language.name: Cebuano
language.area: Negros, Cebu, Bohol, Visayas and parts of Mindanao. Also in United States.
